gallery_text.dialog: Browse the art gallery!|L|We made some of this art ourselves, but we find most of it crumpled up on the floor.

donate_text.dialog: Donate some of your gifts to the gallery!|L|We'll give you |C3|Blot Tokens|C0| and |C3|Karma.|C0|

upgrade_text.dialog: We can use the power of |C3|Tetrids|C0| to improve the gallery!

leave_text.dialog: Let us know when you are leaving, cutie.|L|You can save your tokens for next time!

comment_small_gallery.dialog: Umm... there's not much in there yet, but we are trying our best.

comment_cant_donate.dialog: Our life is a shambled mess and we have nowhere to put your donations right now.

comment_donate_limit.dialog: Our backroom dimension can't fit any more donations today.

comment_token_limit.dialog: You have a lot of |C3|Blot Tokens.|C0||L|Maybe you want to spend some of those, cutie?

comment_max_level.dialog: Our art gallery is now perfect thanks to you, cutie!

cost_line: You can have it for |C3|[VAL1] Blot Tokens.|C0|
cost_line_1: You can have it for |C3|1 Blot Token.|C0|
cost_line_0: You can take it for free, cutie.

comment_free.dialog: |wave|You can just take this one if you want it, cutie.

comment_unknown.dialog: Uh... We don't remember this one.|L|[VAL1]

comment_blop.dialog: Take a little piece of us with you, cutie!|L|[VAL1]

comment_painting1.dialog: Wait, didn't you paint this one?|L||wave|Is that your girlfriend?|norm||L|[VAL1]

comment_painting2.dialog: A cutie with colorless skin painted this one!|L||wave|We think it's her girlfriend.|norm||L|[VAL1]

comment_one.dialog: There is such beauty in its simplicity.|L|[VAL1]

comment_three.dialog: |wave|This one is almost as cute as you!|norm||L|[VAL1]

comment_quick.dialog: Enjoy this one while it lasts.|L|[VAL1]

comment_limit.dialog: We don't think you have any room to carry this one, cutie.

comment_over.dialog: Sorry cutie, we can't afford to give this one away right now.|L|You need |C3|[VAL2] Blot Tokens.|C0|

comment_over_1.dialog: Sorry cutie, we can't afford to give this one away right now.|L|You need |C3|1 Blot Token.|C0|

comment_closed.dialog: Sorry, cutie!|L|We can't let you take anymore today, but you can still look.

buy_confirm.dialog: You want to take this piece?

gift_bought.dialog_rand1: |wave|This one is just for you, cutie.
gift_bought.dialog_rand2: |wave|We knew you would like this one, cutie.
gift_bought.dialog_rand3: We love the colors on this one!
gift_bought.dialog_rand4: |wave|It's almost as cute as you are.

donate_line: We'll give you |C3|[VAL1] Blot Tokens|C0| and |C3|[VAL2] Karma|C0| for it.
donate_line_1: We'll give you |C3|1 Blot Token|C0| and |C3|[VAL2] Karma|C0| for it.

comment_donate_normal.dialog: We can accept this as a donation.|L|[VAL1]

comment_donate_special.dialog: Oh, we were looking for that!|L|[VAL1]

comment_donate_quick.dialog: It seems to be stuck to you!|L|[VAL1]

comment_donate_blessing.dialog: Sure, you can donate pure vibes!|L|[VAL1]

comment_donate_art_blessing.dialog: You have an artistic idea, cutie?|L|[VAL1]

comment_donate_burden.dialog: We could make really angsty art with this vibe, but we understand why you don't want to give it to us.

comment_donate_taken.dialog: You just got that from the gallery.

comment_donate_starter.dialog: We can't take this one from you, cutie.

donate_confirm.dialog: You want to donate this to us?

gift_donated.dialog_rand3: We can't believe you are just giving this to us!

quick_donated.dialog: These fade away so quickly.|L||!||shake|We just had to have it!

comment_upgrade_size_small.dialog: The gallery can only hold |C3|[VAL1] Gifts|C0| right now, but with some tetrids we can create room for one more.

comment_upgrade_size.dialog: The gallery can hold |C3|[VAL1] Gifts|C0| now, but with some more tetrids we can create room for one more!

comment_upgrade_size_maxed.dialog: The gallery can hold |C3|[VAL1] Gifts|C0| now!|L||wave|This is as good as it gets, cutie.

comment_upgrade_limit_first.dialog: We can only give you |C3|1 Gift|C0| per visit, but with some tetrids we can afford to part with another.

comment_upgrade_limit.dialog: We can give you |C3|[VAL1] Gifts|C0| per visit, but with some more tetrids we can afford to part with another!

comment_upgrade_limit_maxed.dialog: We can give you up to |C3|[VAL1] Gifts|C0| every time you visit!|L||wave|This is as good as it gets, cutie.

comment_upgrade_donate_none.dialog: Before we can accept any |C3|Gift donations,|C0| we will need some tetrids to create a place to store them.

comment_upgrade_donate_one.dialog: We can only accept |C3|1 Donation|C0| per visit right now, but with some tetrids we can make room for another.

comment_upgrade_donate.dialog: We can accept |C3|[VAL1] Donations|C0| per visit right now, but with some more tetrids we can make room for another!

comment_upgrade_donate_maxed.dialog: We can accept |C3|[VAL1] Donations|C0| per visit!|L||wave|This is as good as it gets, cutie.

comment_upgrade_fail.dialog: We can't do anything about this until we get some more gift donations.|L|We're so sorry, cutie!

upgrade_size.dialog: We can expand the gallery with these.
We will have even more art next time you visit!

upgrade_size_final.dialog: We can expand the gallery with these.
We won't possibly be able to fit any more art after this!
We couldn't have done this without you, cutie!

upgrade_donation_first.dialog: With this power, we can open a tear into the backroom dimension.
|wave|We actually have a place to put your donations now!
Now we can really start trading some art!

upgrade_donation.dialog: With this power, we can hold more donations in the backroom dimension.
You can now donate more gifts each time you visit!

upgrade_limit_to_2.dialog: Those rainbow tetrids are so tasty!
We can now let you take |C3|2 pieces of art|C0| every time you visit!
It's only fair, cutie.|L||!|You have donated so much to our gallery.

upgrade_limit_to_3.dialog: Sorry, cutie.|L|We just can't help it around those rainbow tetrids.
We can now let you take up to |C3|3 pieces of art|C0| every time you visit!
You have given us so much.|L||!|We hope all this art can empower you too.

green_comment.dialog: Don't tell the others, but this is our favorite tetrid.|L||C3|These give us the most power!

red_comment.dialog: These ones smell like a campfire.

yellow_comment.dialog: These don't taste very good.|L|We should probably stop eating them.

blue_comment.dialog: |shake|These hurt our skin!|norm||L|What a shame.|L|Blue is such a beautiful color.

orange_comment.dialog: We can hear a little song coming from these.|L|Can you hear it?

purple_comment.dialog: These feel so sad.|L|We will give them hugs.

upgrade_confirm.dialog: You want to give these to us, cutie?

leave_blank.dialog: I had such a lovely time here.
We are so happy to hear that!
Oh you are so affectionate, cutie.|L||!||wave|We love you!

leave_defect.dialog: We hope you had a lovely time.
Of course we did.|L||!|I'm only sorry that the other guests mistook my beauty for a piece of artwork.
But we are the only ones here.
|wave|And yet, you couldn't keep your eyes off of me.
We are glad that you had a good time, cuties.

leave_twins.dialog: Before we go, my sister really wanted you to paint her.
|wave|You are going to look so cute!

leave_devil.dialog_rand1: I liked all the dark ones with the eyeballs.
leave_devil.dialog_rand2: Some of those pieces were |shake|so metal!
leave_devil.dialog_rand3: Did you see the one with the indescribable horror on it?
leave_devil.dialog_rand4: I like the ones that look like my nightmares.

leave_devil.dialog_rand1: Yeah, and all the ones with those cute hearts!
leave_devil.dialog_rand2: And how about that cute one with the pretty lady?
leave_devil.dialog_rand3: Right? And the ones with all those colorful flowers!
leave_devil.dialog_rand4: Did you see the one with the cute girl on it?

leave_default.dialog: We hope you visit us again soon.
